summary: Ever wanted to make a home for yourself in Esbern's now abandoned vault? Well now you can!
descriptionHtml:
This mod turns Esbern's Vault into a player home. Features include:
[list][*][size=2]A trapdoor in Riften, near to the Thieves Guild secret entrance, leading directly to Esbern's Vault in the Ratway Warrens.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]The chest by the bed has been changed to not respawn so it can be used as a personal storage chest.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]The mead keg will now dispense nord mead.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]A book shelf has been added to store your books on.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]More lights have been added to brighten the place up a bit.[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
For the next update I hope to implement a system where the door will automatically lock when closed, to increase immersion.

[b]Compatibility:[/b] I don't know of any mods that will conflict with this mod

[b]Installation: [/b]Don't install this mod until AFTER you have completed the part of the main quest where you have to find Esbern. Then just install via NMM, or manually extract the esp to your data folder and merge the scripts folder with the one in your data folder (just one script is used for the mead keg).[/size]
author: simsim899
